comments:
java.lang.NullPointerException when testing a connection to remote host.

When testing a connection to remote host (9.37.207.140) in Window >> Preferences >> Profiling and Logging >> Hosts using the TPTP-4.3.0-200609200100 driver, the following exception is thrown and the connection is not tested:

java.lang.NullPointerException when testing connection to remote host.
